price: Бу ишда бир белги бордир. Уларнинг кўплари мўмин бўлмадилар.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
